data.name: CHESS CROWN
data.detailed_description:
Immersed in the atmospheric world of the game, you have to decide which side you are on for good or evil.
The game against the computer is suitable for players starting their acquaintance with chess. In multiplayer, the player will be able to find a suitable opponent by level or fight with a superior in class. The game has a time setting, a choice of the type of chess pieces and the location where the battle will take place, as well as the ability to communicate with an opponent in a chat.
data.about_the_game:
Immersed in the atmospheric world of the game, you have to decide which side you are on for good or evil.
The game against the computer is suitable for players starting their acquaintance with chess. In multiplayer, the player will be able to find a suitable opponent by level or fight with a superior in class. The game has a time setting, a choice of the type of chess pieces and the location where the battle will take place, as well as the ability to communicate with an opponent in a chat.
data.short_description: CHESS CROWN- chess in a medieval fantasy theme and with the opportunity to compete with other players on the network.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.6 Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Video Card or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 3.2 Quad Core Processor or Greater
  • Graphics: 4 GB Dedicated Video Card or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
